mapper.sql: user_id, password, username, phone, user_real_name, nickname, last_login_time, last_login_ip, email
mapper.select: select count(*) as r from userinfo where username = #{username} and password = #{password}
mapper.insert:
insert into userinfo
user_id,
password,
username,
phone,
user_real_name,
nickname,
last_login_time,
last_login_ip,
email,

mapper.update:
update userinfo
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_real_name = #{userRealName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
last_login_time = #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
last_login_ip = #{lastLoginIp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update userinfo set password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_real_name = #{userRealName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_login_time = #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_login_ip = #{lastLoginIp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
